entry.dcterms:description: drug consumption, drug use, risk behaviors related to intravenous use and sexual life
entry.dcterms:subject: local society, region
health condition
drug abuse, alcohol and smoking
family life, marriage, relationship
person
survey data
cross-section

The basic population is the group of drug users in Budapest. Members of the group which did not receive any therapeutic treatment were contacted by interviewers having privileged access through their own network. The other group of respondents in the research were drawn in the research through therapeutic intitutions.
face-to-face interview
D (after 2007-12-31: A)
